Text saved: Sometimes, it is a mystery why a bridge collapses. Engineers only understand the reason after they do a complete study. In some cases, this happens because the material used to build the bridge was not good quality. It can also happen because there was a problem with an important part of the bridge. In other situations, the bridge was designed to hold only a specific amount of weight and not more.
